GSP30partr_pu:0: śrīdevī uvāca anuttaraṃ kathaṃ deva sadyaḥkaulikasiddhidam /
GSP30partr_pu:2: etad guhyaṃ mahāguhyaṃ kathayasva mama prabho /
GSP30partr_pu:3: hṛdayasthā tu yā śaktiḥ kaulinī kulanāyikā // ParTri_2 //
GSP30partr_pu:4: tāṃ me kathaya deveśa yena tṛptiṃ labhāmy aham /
GSP30partr_pu:5: śrībhairava uvāca śṛṇu devi mahābhage uttarasyāpy anuttaram // ParTri_3 //
GSP30partr_pu:6: yad ayaṃ kauliko vidhir mama hṛdvyomny avasthitaḥ /
GSP30partr_pu:7: kathayāmi na saṃdehaḥ sadyaḥ kaulikasiddhidam // ParTri_4 //
GSP30partr_pu:11: kramāt kādiṣu vargeṣu makārānteṣu suvrate // ParTri_6 //
GSP30partr_pu:15: amūlā tatkramā jñeyā kṣāntā sṛṣṭir udāhṛtā /
GSP30partr_pu:16: sarveṣāṃ caiva mantrāṇāṃ vidyānāṃ ca yaśasvini // ParTri_8 //
GSP30partr_pu:20: etan nāyoginījāto nārudro labhate sphuṭam // ParTri_10 //
GSP30partr_pu:22: asyoccāre kṛte samyaṅ mantramudrāgaṇo mahān // ParTri_11 //
GSP30partr_pu:24: muhūrtaṃ smarate yas tu cumbakenābhimudritaḥ // ParTri_12 //
GSP30partr_pu:25: sa badhnāti tadā dehaṃ mantramudrāgaṇaṃ naraḥ /
GSP30partr_pu:28: sakṣāt paśyaty asaṃdigdham ākṛṣṭaṃ rudraśaktibhiḥ // ParTri_14 //
GSP30partr_pu:30: trayeṇa mātaraḥ sarvā yogeśvaryo mahābalāḥ // ParTri_15 //
GSP30partr_pu:32: āgatya samayaṃ dattvā bhairaveṇa pracoditāḥ // ParTri_16 //
GSP30partr_pu:33: yacchanti paramāṃ siddhiṃ phalaṃ yad vā samīhitam /
GSP30partr_pu:34: anena siddhāḥ setsyanti sādhayanti ca mantriṇaḥ // ParTri_17 //
GSP30partr_pu:35: yat kiṃcid bhairave tantre sarvam asmāt prasiddhyati /
GSP30partr_pu:36: adṛṣṭamaṇdalo 'py evaṃ yaḥ kaścid vetti tattvataḥ /
GSP30partr_pu:37: sa siddhibhāg bhaven nityaṃ sa yogī sa ca dīkṣitaḥ // ParTri_18 //
GSP30partr_pu:39: śākinīkulasāmānyo bhaved yogaṃ vināpi hi // ParTri_19 //
GSP30partr_pu:40: avidhijño vidhānajño jāyate yajanaṃ prati // ParTri_20 //
GSP30partr_pu:42: śivo viśvādyanantāntaḥ paraṃ śaktitrayaṃ matam // ParTri_21 //
GSP30partr_pu:43: tadantar varti yat kiṃcic chuddhamārge vyavasthitam /
GSP30partr_pu:44: aṇur viśuddham acirād aiśvaraṃ jñānam aśnute // ParTri_22 //
GSP30partr_pu:46: sarvago nirmalaḥ svacchas tṛptaḥ svāyatanaḥ śuciḥ // ParTri_23 //
GSP30partr_pu:48: tathā hṛdayabījasthaṃ jagad etac carācaram // ParTri_24 //
GSP30partr_pu:49: evaṃ yo vetti tattvena tasya nirvāṇagāminī /
GSP30partr_pu:51: mūrdhni vaktre ca hṛdaye guhye mūrtau tathaiva ca /
GSP30partr_pu:52: nyāsaṃ krtvā śikhāṃ baddhvā saptaviṃśatimantritām // ParTri_26 //
GSP30partr_pu:53: ekaikaṃ tu diśāṃ bandhaṃ daśānām api yojayet /
GSP30partr_pu:54: tālatrayam purā dattvā saśabdaṃ vighnaśāntaye // ParTri_27 //
GSP30partr_pu:56: puṣpādikaṃ kramāt sarvaṃ liṅge vā sthaṇḍile 'thavā // ParTri_28 //
GSP30partr_pu:58: tatra sṛṣṭiṃ yajed vīraḥ punar evāsanaṃ tataḥ // ParTri_29 //
GSP30partr_pu:59: sṛṣṭiṃ tu sampuṭīkṛtya paścād yajanam ārabhet /
GSP30partr_pu:62: tataḥ sugandhipuṣpais tu yathāśaktyā samarcayet // ParTri_31 //
GSP30partr_pu:63: pūjayet parayā bhaktyā ātmanaṃ ca nivedayet /
GSP30partr_pu:64: evaṃ yajanam ākhyātam agnikārye 'py ayaṃ vidhiḥ // ParTri_32 //
GSP30partr_pu:67: hṛtpadmāntargataṃ dhyāyet somāṃśaṃ nityam abhyasyet // ParTri_33 //
GSP30partr_pu:69: etad abhyāsataḥ siddhiḥ sarvajñatvam avāpyate // ParTri_35 //
